1.title: Manchester

episode of.title: BMX Supercross World Cup Series 2013 (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: The first round of 2013 UCI BMX Supercross World Cup took place in Manchester at the National Indoor BMX Arena. As usual the competition consisted of a time-trail on the first day followed by heats and finals on the second day. Shanaze Reade and Liam Phillips of Great Britain won the time-trial prizes and went on to win the finals.

2.title: Santiago Del Estero

episode of.title: BMX Supercross World Cup Series 2013 (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: The UK's Shanaze Reade is putting a relatively turbulent two years behind her in spectacular fashion, showing she's back to her best with a second straight win in the UCI BMX SX World Cup series at Santiago del Estero, Argentina. The USA's Connor Fields showed his class to take the men's win ahead of Jelle Van Gorkom.

3.title: Papendal

episode of.title: BMX Supercross World Cup Series 2013 (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: The third stop on the UCI BMX SX calendar saw the racers arrive in Papendal, Holland to go head to head. Mariana Pajon won the Superfinal Time Trial competition then progressed through to the main final before holding off a good charge from the USA's Arielle Martin to take the win. In the men's race Jelle van Gorkom, narrowly took the win just a quarter of a second ahead of Edzus Treimanis.

imdb.title: BMX Supercross World Cup Series 2013
akas: BMX Supercross World Cup Series 2013 (United Kingdom)
plot: The BMX Supercross World Cup Series sees the biggest names in BMX racing battling out around a 350m course of bends, bumps and jumps.
